name: Tofu Stir-Fry with Peanut Sauce (Vegan)
author: Julia Rose
summary: This is a throwback recipe from when I was a hardcore vegan, but it's still one of my staples years later. It's healthy, filling, and full of flavor!
ingredients: 1 (14 ounce) package firm tofu, drained and cut into 1-inch cubes
directions: Whisk coconut milk, peanut butter, soy sauce, brown sugar, lime juice, sriracha sauce, and ground chile powder in a bowl until a smooth sauce forms
Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat
Add carrots and red bell pepper; saute until just tender, 1 to 2 minutes
Add tofu; saute until lightly browned, about 4 minutes per side
Add garlic and ginger; cook and stir until fragrant, about 30 seconds
Pour sauce into the skillet; stir to coat tofu, carrots, and bell pepper
Cook until flavors combine, about 5 minutes
Reduce heat to low; stir in spinach 1 cup at a time until wilted
